meanings.definition: A unit of luminance equal to one candela per square meter.
meanings.sent1: The screen brightness was measured in lamberts.
meanings.sent2: The room was lit with five lamberts of light.
meanings.sent3: The lamberts on the display were so bright, they almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated like a thousand lamberts of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The lamberts of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A unit of luminous intensity equal to one lumen per square centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The flashlight emitted strong lamberts in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The lamp had a brightness of ten lamberts.
meanings.sent3: The lamberts from the candle flickered romantically in the room.
meanings.sent4: His eyes shone with lamberts of determination.
meanings.sent5: The stage was lit with lamberts that highlighted the performers.

meanings.definition: A unit of luminous flux equal to one lumen per square centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The light bulb emitted bright lamberts throughout the room.
meanings.sent2: The lantern had a luminosity of five lamberts.
meanings.sent3: The lamberts from the fireflies created a magical atmosphere.
